functions.name: Get Talent Layer Users
functions.description: Returns all users that have minted a TalentLayer ID

functions.name: Get Talent experienced in a topic
functions.description: Returns all users that already work at least a given number of times on a given topic project on TalentLayer protocol

functions.name: Get most rated talent
functions.description: Returns all users that completed work at least a given number of times with a minimum given rating on TalentLayer protocol

args.name: minRating
args.description: The selected minimum rating, from 0 to 5

args.name: minimumEarnings
args.description: The minimal amount the user must have earned

functions.name: Check if a User did a service for a company a minimal amount of times
functions.description: Check to see if a user did a service for a specific company a minimal amount of times

args.name: minimalAmountOfServices
args.description: The minimal amount of services the user must have performed
